Don‚Äôt just take our word for it
Fahad Ahmad • Founder of Ketogeek

I like being lazy. Nutrita makes me smart and lazy. That‚Äôs how I boost productivity and can chase experiences in life knowing all my information is easily tracked for me.

Andrew Louro • Nutrita Pro user

I must say however, I am very impressed with firstly your customer support and also with the level of input into the quality of the food entries and various scores, in my opinion this puts Nutrita in pole position among tracking apps, I don‚Äôt know of any other that offers well researched and meaningful food scores, much less accurate entries in the food data base. As I said customer support, amazing, especially the free consult with Raphael.

>Ernie B-au • Nutrita Pro user

A BIG THANKS !
I love my Nutrita App ! , it has been my essential toolkit to get my health back on track. Learning what to eat to regain health has been fundamental in Reversing my Pre diabetes and maintaining my Blood Sugar control, the App makes it SO EASY to make the right choices with food. If I stray off my daily nutritional intake the App quickly identifies how to get back by suggesting foods to boost the mineral or Vitamin that was less than normal.
The recipe options makes meal choices so easy....everything set out for you...and so many are delicious and filling.
After using it for 7 months now....it has been such a valuable resource for me.
Highly recommended by ME !
Well done to Raphael and the team !

How does the 7-day trial work?

Cancel at any time in your account settings. You won't be charged if you cancel before 28 Apr 2019.

How do I pay for your service?

At the end of your free trial, you will be charged automatically in order to continue to use the service. You can choose between Monthly and Yearly billing. We accept credit & debit cards, PayPal, Google Pay, and Apple Pay.

How can I cancel my subscription?

You can cancel your plan anytime. When your subscription period expires, you will lose access to your Nutrita account.

I have a different question‚Ä¶

Explore our Help Center, or just ask via e-mail at hello@nutrita.app

Can I recover an expired account?

You can recover an expired account by buying a plan and re-access everything you've been tracking. Your data will remain intact for 14 days.

How does the 7-day trial work?

Cancel at any time in your account settings. You won't be charged if you cancel before 28 Apr 2019.

How do I pay for your service?

At the end of your free trial, you will be charged automatically in order to continue to use the service. You can choose between Monthly and Yearly billing. We accept credit & debit cards, PayPal, Google Pay, and Apple Pay.

How can I cancel my subscription?

You can cancel your plan anytime. When your subscription period expires, you will lose access to your Nutrita account.

I have a different question‚Ä¶

Explore our Help Center, or just ask via e-mail at hello@nutrita.app

Can I recover an expired account?

You can recover an expired account by buying a plan and re-access everything you've been tracking. Your data will remain intact for 14 days.

About you

cm

Why asking me these details

Your personal information are used to give you detailed guidance and interpretation of your nutrition. To make sure you get reliable data from your tracking, it's important to give as accurate information as possible. Your physical settings are never public, only you can see them.

How-To

Your waist is situated just after the top of your hip bone. If you don‚Äôt have a tape measure at home, use your earbuds cable and wrap your waist with it. Compare the lenght measured with a A4 paper sheet. A A4 measures 21.0 √ó 29.7 centimeters.

How does the 7-day trial work?

Cancel at any time in your account settings. You won't be charged if you cancel before 28 Apr 2019.

How do I pay for your service?

At the end of your free trial, you will be charged automatically in order to continue to use the service. You can choose between Monthly and Yearly billing. We accept credit & debit cards, PayPal, Google Pay, and Apple Pay.

How can I cancel my subscription?

You can cancel your plan anytime. When your subscription period expires, you will lose access to your Nutrita account.

I have a different question‚Ä¶

Explore our Help Center, or just ask via e-mail at hello@nutrita.app

Can I recover an expired account?

You can recover an expired account by buying a plan and re-access everything you've been tracking. Your data will remain intact for 14 days.

Recipe title

This is recipe heaven for those who don‚Äôt like to cook. Healthy easy avocado boats filled with tuna mayo, prawn cocktail or a baked egg with bacon bits. Keto, Paleo low-carb heaven.

8 mn.

Prep time

10 mn.

Cook time

Ingredients

  • Food title on one single line

    1.9 x cup. Chopped

    • Keto score Good

      7/10

    • Nutrient Density Moderate

      7/10

    • Insulin Index Moderate

      7/10
    •

Recipe

Step 1
Mix the tuna and mayonnaise and any spices you like, add to the centre of the avocado boat.
Step 2
Sprinkle with salt and cracked pepper.
Step 3
Crack an egg into the hollowed out centre of the avocado. Bake at 180C/350F for 10 minutes, or until the egg is cooked to your preference.

Help

How invitations work

Every time a new Nutrita Premium user signs up with your invitation code, they'll get a discount on their first trip (value amounts vary by location).

Once they start their first month of premium subscription, you'll automatically get $US 5 off your next subscription payment.

Discounts register automatically and expire 90 days from their issue date.

Why asking me these details

Your personal information are used to give you detailed guidance and interpretation of your nutrition. To make sure you get reliable data from your tracking, it's important to give as accurate information as possible. Your physical settings are never public, only you can see them.

Why asking me these details

Your personal information are used to give you detailed guidance and interpretation of your nutrition. To make sure you get reliable data from your tracking, it's important to give as accurate information as possible. Your physical settings are never public, only you can see them.
